---
title: "Daniel Roelfs's CV"
author: Daniel Roelfs
date: "`r Sys.Date()`"
params:
  pdf_mode:
    value: true
output:
  pagedown::html_resume:
    css: ["./style.css", "resume"]
    self_contained: true
editor_options:
  chunk_output_type: console
---

```{r knits-opts, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(results="asis", echo = FALSE)
```

```{r setup}
library(magrittr) # For the pipe

source("./cv_printing_functions.r")

# Read in all data and initialize a CV printer object
CV <- create_CV_object(
  data_location = "https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1mAOw23NeFpfj_O5WMUpbR8wXdShQkwp4rzESFMhdXw8",  
  pdf_mode = params$pdf_mode
)

CV$entries_data <- CV$entries_data %>% 
  mutate(include = as.logical(include)) %>% 
  filter(include)
```


```{r}
# When in pdf export mode the little dots are unaligned, so fix that with some conditional CSS.
if (params$pdf_mode) {
  cat("
<style>
:root{
  --decorator-outer-offset-left: -6.5px;
}
</style>")
}
```
